</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Assess the safety and PK of Xtampza intact, chewed and crushed
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:42.84%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 24.5PT;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Oral Chewed PK and HAP Clinical Trial
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(CP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;OXYDET
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;24)
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Categories&nbsp;2&nbsp;&amp; 3
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.08%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.32%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	n&nbsp;= 36
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.06%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:22.10%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Crushed immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone tablets
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.06%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 18PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:22.54%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 18PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;">
	&#xF0B7;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Assess the PK (Category&nbsp;2) and drug
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;likeability (Category&nbsp;3) of Xtampza, intact and chewed
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:42.84%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 24.5PT;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Comparative Crushing/Tampering PK Clinical Trial
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(CP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;OXYDET
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;25)
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Category&nbsp;2
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.08%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.32%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	n&nbsp;= 36
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.06%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:22.10%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	OxyContin OP (intact and crushed) and crushed immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone tablets
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.06%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 18PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:22.54%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 18PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;">
	&#xF0B7;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Assess the safety and PK of Xtampza, intact and crushed
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Oral Crushed/Chewed PK Clinical Trial (CP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8209;OXYDET
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8209;17)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our oral crushed/chewed PK clinical trial (CP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;OXYDET
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;17) was an open
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;label, randomized, active
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;controlled, crossover clinical trial to evaluate the effect of tampering (crushing and chewing) on Xtampza microspheres compared with immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone solution. The clinical trial had seven treatment arms, consisting of three fasted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;state treatment arms and four fed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;state treatment arms. Because Xtampza has a food effect, the tentative product label for Xtampza instructs patients to take Xtampza capsules with approximately the same amount of food for every dose in order to ensure consistent plasma levels are achieved. Accordingly, the graph below provides only the results of the clinical trial for the fed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;state treatment arms.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mean Concentrations of Oxycodone
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K008.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 5.884722IN; HEIGHT: 3.439583IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	21
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage22"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#COLL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As demonstrated above, crushing or chewing Xtampza did not increase its C
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	as compared to the intact Xtampza capsules. All treatment groups had substantially lower peak plasma levels and longer time to peak plasma level, or T
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, than the immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone solution. The absorption of oxycodone, as measured by AUC, was substantially equivalent among the crushed, chewed and intact Xtampza treatment groups. In all Xtampza treatment groups, the extended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release properties remained intact and there was no evidence of dose dumping.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	C
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Ratios Relative to Xtampza Intact Capsules Baseline
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K009.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 5.815278IN; HEIGHT: 2.653472IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Substantial early increases in plasma concentrations after crushing or chewing, compared to intact capsules are indicative of dose dumping. As a result, the product labels for all currently available orally administered extended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release opioids include a black box warning instructing patients that &#x201C;crushing, dissolving or chewing the tablet can cause rapid release and absorption of a potential fatal dose&#x201D; of the respective opioid. The results of the clinical trial shown in the graph below demonstrate that crushing and chewing, two common methods of manipulation used by abusers, did not increase the early plasma concentration of Xtampza when taken orally.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Graphical Display of Mean Oxycodone Partial AUC Values from 0.25 to 3.5&nbsp;hours
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K010.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 5.572222IN; HEIGHT: 3.167361IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	22
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage23"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#COLL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Another measure used to assess the potential &#x201C;likability&#x201D; of a drug for abusers is the &#x201C;abuse quotient,&#x201D; or AQ, which characterizes the rate at which the peak plasma rises after ingestion and is calculated by dividing C
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	by T
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. By manipulating a formulation, an abuser seeks to create euphoria by maximizing AQ. As shown in the graph below, the AQ values for Xtampza after crushing or chewing were the same as taking the product intact and meaningfully lower than for the immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone solution.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mean AQ Values for Each Treatment
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K011.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.248611IN; HEIGHT: 2.636111IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In summary, in this clinical trial, manipulation of Xtampza microspheres by crushing or chewing did not alter the extended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release properties of the Xtampza formulation in the fed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;state treatment arms.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Oral Chewed PK and HAP Clinical Trial (CP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8209;OXYDET
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8209;24)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our oral chewed PK and HAP clinical trial was designed to assess the PK of Xtampza following chewing as compared to taking the product candidate intact and also as compared to crushing an immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone tablet. The clinical trial design was consistent with FDA guidance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The results shown in the figure below indicate that for C
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and AUC, Xtampza intact and Xtampza chewed are bioequivalent with equivalent T
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. These results indicate that chewing Xtampza does not affect the peak and overall exposure to oxycodone.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	23
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage24"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#COLL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mean Concentrations of Oxycodone
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K012.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.260417IN; HEIGHT: 3.636111IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The figure below further demonstrates that chewing Xtampza does not affect C
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	relative to intact Xtampza capsules. Ratios below 100% indicate chewing does not increase peak plasma exposure versus baseline (taking Xtampza intact).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	C
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Ratios Relative to Intact Xtampza Capsules
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K013.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 5.601389IN; HEIGHT: 2.780555IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	To better characterize early plasma exposure, partial area under the curve, or PAUC (which measures cumulative absorption over an initial period, in this case five hours, after dosage), and AQ values were calculated for each treatment arm. Over the timeframe of the first sampling time to five hours after dosing, the PAUC values for all Xtampza treatments were substantially lower than the immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone crushed solution PAUC values. The small increase in PAUC for the manipulated Xtampza capsules relative to intact capsules was anticipated because the microspheres were removed from the capsules prior to oral administration and were therefore more rapidly exposed to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage25"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#COLL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the gastric environment for absorption. As shown in the figures below, the mean PAUC and AQ values for all Xtampza treatments were substantially lower than the immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone crushed solution AQ.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Graphical Display of Mean Oxycodone Partial AUC Values over the First 5&nbsp;hours
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K014.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 5.791667IN; HEIGHT: 3.104167IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mean AQ Values for Each Treatment
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K015.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.3IN; HEIGHT: 2.600875IN" ALT="PICTURE 31">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In summary, the PK data from this clinical trial indicate that there is no material increase in plasma exposure or dose dumping when Xtampza is administered after chewing, when compared to intact Xtampza. Similar to our oral crushed/chewed PK clinical trial, our oral chewed PK and HAP clinical trial demonstrated that intact and manipulated Xtampza are bioequivalent to each other.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	25
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage26"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#COLL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Comparative Crushing/Tampering PK Clinical Trial (CP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8209;OXYDET
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8209;25)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our comparative crushing/tampering PK clinical trial was an open
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;label, randomized, active
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;controlled, cross
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;over, single
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;dose clinical trial that evaluated the effect of crushing Xtampza, OxyContin OP and immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone tablets.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The figure on the left below indicates that crushing does not materially increase the C
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	or materially change the AUC of Xtampza compared with the intact product, which retains its oral extended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release properties when crushed, confirming observations from our oral crushed/chewed PK clinical trial. By contrast, the OxyContin OP data in the figure on the right below show that OxyContin OP exhibits&nbsp;a higher C
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and shorter T
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	when administered orally in the crushed state, as compared with the intact state, essentially converting OxyContin OP from an extended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release to an immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release formulation. This in vivo observation is consistent with in vitro studies on OxyContin OP, which showed that the amount of drug released in one hour increased from 17% in the intact state to 77% following crushing.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mean Concentrations of Oxycodone
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K016.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.740278IN; HEIGHT: 2.369444IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The figure below shows the mean PAUC values from the first sampling time to two hours for all treatments. Over the first two hours after dosing, the PAUC values for intact and crushed Xtampza, as well as intact OxyContin OP, treatments were substantially lower than the corresponding crushed immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone values. Over this same timeframe, the PAUC values for crushed OxyContin OP overlapped with those of crushed immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone. The small increase in PAUC for the crushed Xtampza treatment relative to intact Xtampza was anticipated because the microspheres were removed from the capsules prior to oral administration and were therefore more rapidly exposed to the gastric environment for absorption.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	26
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage27"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#COLL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Graphical Display of Mean Oxycodone Partial AUC Values from 0.25 to 2&nbsp;hours
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K017.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.132639IN; HEIGHT: 3.288889IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As shown in the figure below, mean AQ values were comparable for crushed and intact Xtampza treatments and substantially lower than crushed immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone. In contrast to Xtampza, crushing OxyContin OP compromises its extended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release profile such that the AQ value of crushed OxyContin OP increases by nearly four times and is similar to that of immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Graphical Display of Mean (SD) AQ Values for Each Treatment
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K018.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.445139IN; HEIGHT: 3.092361IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In summary, crushing Xtampza microspheres does not materially change the extended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release properties of the product. By contrast, crushing OxyContin OP with common household tools causes it to completely lose its extended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release properties, turning it into an immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release and readily abuseable formulation. The data in this clinical trial confirm and extend the findings from previous studies, demonstrating that crushing or chewing Xtampza should not lead to a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	27
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage28"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#COLL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	potentially fatal rapid release of oxycodone via &#x201C;dose dumping&#x201D; should a patient or a drug abuser crush, break or grind Xtampza.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Category&nbsp;2: Intranasal PK Clinical Trials
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We completed two intranasal PK clinical trials to support abuse
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;deterrent product labeling for Xtampza.
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:34.60%;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 24.5PT;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Intranasal PK Clinical Trial
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(CP

<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.28%;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	n&nbsp;= 15
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.08%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:17.54%;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Oxycodone powder
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.08%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 18PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:35.34%;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 18PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;">
	&#xF0B7;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Compare the safety and PK of crushed and intact Xtampza following intranasal administration.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:34.60%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 24.5PT;TEXT-INDENT: -24.5PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Intranasal PK and HAP Clinical Trial
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(CP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;OXYDET
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;21)
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Categories&nbsp;2&nbsp;&amp; 3
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.08%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.28%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	n&nbsp;= 36
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.08%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:17.54%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Crushed immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone tablets
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.08%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 18PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:35.34%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 18PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;">
	&#xF0B7;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Evaluate the PK (Category&nbsp;2) and abuse potential (Category&nbsp;3) of crushed and intact Xtampza following snorting and oral administration.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Intranasal PK Clinical Trial (CP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8209;OXYDET
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8209;19)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our intranasal PK clinical trial was a randomized, open
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;label, active
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;controlled, cross
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;over comparison trial. The primary objective was to compare the safety and PK of crushed and snorted Xtampza, intact Xtampza capsules taken orally, and snorted immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone powder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Data from this clinical trial demonstrated that administration of crushed and snorted Xtampza resulted in a lower C
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	than both intact Xtampza taken orally and snorted immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone powder; the C
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for crushed and snorted Xtampza was approximately 80% of intact Xtampza taken orally and 60% of snorted immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone powder. The median T
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	following crushed and snorted Xtampza was equivalent to the median T
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for intact Xtampza taken orally, and both demonstrated longer median T
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	values than snorted immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone powder. Crushed and snorted Xtampza, intact Xtampza taken orally, and snorted immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone powder were all bioequivalent with respect to AUC parameters.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mean Concentrations of Oxycodone
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K019.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 5.947917IN; HEIGHT: 3.664583IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	28
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage29"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#COLL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The figure below shows the mean PAUC values from the first sampling time to two hours for two treatments. Over the first two hours after dosing, the PAUC values for crushed and snorted Xtampza treatments were substantially lower than the crushed and snorted immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone powder values.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Graphical Display of Mean Oxycodone Partial AUC Values from 0.1 to 2&nbsp;hours
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K020.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.2IN; HEIGHT: 2.989491IN" ALT="PICTURE 32">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As shown in the figure below, the mean AQ values for crushed and snorted Xtampza and intact Xtampza taken orally were comparable. In this clinical trial, no increase in AQ was observed with crushed and snorted Xtampza relative to intact Xtampza taken orally. In contrast, the AQ value for snorted immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone powder was approximately five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;fold higher, on average, than that for crushed and snorted Xtampza.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mean AQ Values for Each Treatment
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K021.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.740278IN; HEIGHT: 2.326389IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In summary, crushed and snorted Xtampza microspheres demonstrated a lower C
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and an equivalent T
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	compared to taking the intact product orally as directed. The C
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of both crushed and snorted Xtampza and intact Xtampza taken orally are substantially lower than the C
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of snorted immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone powder. Crushing and snorting Xtampza microspheres did not produce the rapid, high plasma concentrations that abusers might seek for euphoria. Additionally, crushed and snorted Xtampza produced a higher percentage of mild respiratory AEs (e.g.,&nbsp;nasal discomfort and congestion) and associated transient nasal events including burning, and facial pain/pressure compared with the immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release comparator.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	29
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage30"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#COLL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Intranasal PK and HAP Clinical Trial (CP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8209;OXYDET
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8209;21)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Our intranasal PK and HAP clinical trial was a randomized, open
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;label, active
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;controlled, cross
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;over comparison clinical trial. The primary objective was to compare the safety and PK of crushed and snorted Xtampza, intact Xtampza capsules taken orally, and snorted crushed immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone tablets.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The PK results from our intranasal PK and HAP clinical trial are similar to those observed in our intranasal PK clinical trial. With respect to AUC, crushed and snorted Xtampza was bioequivalent to intact Xtampza taken orally. However, crushed and snorted Xtampza microspheres resulted in approximately 70% of the peak exposure of intact Xtampza taken orally and approximately 50% of the peak exposure of crushed and snorted immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone. Median T
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	was equivalent when comparing crushed and snorted Xtampza relative to intact Xtampza taken orally. Both Xtampza treatments had substantially longer median T
</FONT>
<SUB STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	max
</SUB>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	values in comparison to crushed and snorted immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mean Concentrations of Oxycodone
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K022.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 5.7IN; HEIGHT: 3.439583IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The figure below shows the mean PAUC values from the first sampling time to five hours for all three treatment arms. Over the first five hours after dosing, the PAUC values for intact Xtampza and crushed and snorted Xtampza treatments were substantially lower than those of the crushed and snorted immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone treatment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	30
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage31"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#COLL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Graphical Display of Mean Oxycodone Partial AUC Values from 0.25 to 5&nbsp;hours
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K023.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.740278IN; HEIGHT: 2.872222IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The mean AQ value for crushed and snorted Xtampza was similar to (and slightly lower than) that of intact Xtampza taken orally. By contrast, the mean AQ value for the crushed and snorted immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release oxycodone treatment was approximately 11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;fold greater than that of crushed and snorted Xtampza. These data indicate that crushed and snorted Xtampza may potentially be less desirable to (i.e.,&nbsp;less liked by) drug abusers seeking to achieve a rapid, euphoric effect.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mean AQ Values for Each Treatment
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/18/0001558370-16-004252_COLL20151231X10K024.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.740278IN; HEIGHT: 2.592361IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In summary, data from our intranasal PK and HAP clinical trial corroborate the findings from our intranasal PK clinical trial. Both clinical trials indicate that crushed and snorted Xtampza microspheres do not produce the rapid rise in peak plasma drug concentrations that abusers might seek for euphoria when manipulating and administering dosage forms by the nasal route. Additionally, crushed and snorted Xtampza produced a higher percentage of mild respiratory AEs (e.g.,&nbsp;nasal discomfort, nasal congestion and nose bleeds) and associated transient nasal events including irritation, burning, and facial pain compared with the immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;release comparator. The AEs following crushed and snorting Xtampza microspheres, without the addition of potentially harmful antagonist or aversive agents, may serve as a nuisance to an abuser who wants to snort Xtampza.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage32"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#COLL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Category&nbsp;3: Human Abuse Potential Clinical Trials
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	We conducted two clinical trials&nbsp;&#x2014; our intranasal and oral PK and HAP clinical trial and our oral chewed PK and HAP clinical trial&nbsp;&#x2014; to evaluate the HAP of crushed Xtampza microspheres taken orally and snorted, as described in the table below.
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_10"></A>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.08%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

	&nbsp;

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:16.56%;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:27.02%;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

</FONT>

<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:12.86%;PADDING:0PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Oral chewed PK and human abuse potential clinical trial
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.08%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:16.56%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Crushed immediate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.14%;PADDING:0PT;">

</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:27.02%;PADDING:0PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
