<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In March 2015, the Company issued and sold an aggregate of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	41,666,667
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Series D convertible preferred stock for aggregate consideration of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$50,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, comprised of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$45,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in cash and conversion of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$5,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in Bridge Notes.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of December&nbsp;31, 2015, the authorized capital stock of the Company included
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	100,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of common stock, par value
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$0.001
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	20,739,351
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of which were issued and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	outstanding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. As of December&nbsp;31, 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of preferred stock were authorized, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	none
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	were issued and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	outstanding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Common Stock
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In May 2015, the Company closed an initial public offering (&#x201C;IPO) of its common stock, which resulted in the sale of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	6,670,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of its common stock at a public offering price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$12.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share, including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	870,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of common stock upon the exercise by the underwriters of their option to purchase additional shares at the public offering price. The Company received proceeds from the IPO of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$72,029
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	after deducting underwriting discounts, commissions and expenses payable by the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In April 2015, in connection with preparing for the IPO, the Company&#x2019;s board of directors and shareholders approved a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;6.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	reverse split of the Company&#x2019;s common stock. All common stock share and per share amounts in the financial statements have been retroactively adjusted for all periods presented to give effect to the reverse split of our common stock, including reclassifying an amount equal to the reduction in par value to additional paid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;in capital
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	onnection with the closing of the IPO, all of the Company&#x2019;s outstanding convertible preferred stock and accrued dividends automatically converted to common stock in May 2015, resulting in an additional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	12,591,463
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of common stock of the Company becoming outstanding. The significant increase in common stock outstanding in May 2015 is expected to impact the year-over-year comparability of the Company&#x2019;s net loss per share calculations in future periods.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of December 31, 2015 and 2014, the Company had reserved the following shares of common stock for the issuance of common stock for the exercise of stock options
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	warrant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s, the issuance of shares under the employee stock purchase plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and conversion of preferred stock (in thousands):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Convertible Redeemable Preferred Stock&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Series&nbsp;A, B and Series&nbsp;C Redeemable Convertible Preferred Stock
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In February 2012, the Company exchanged all previously outstanding preferred stock into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	18,464,674
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock (&#x201C;Series&nbsp;A&#x201D;), par value
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$0.001
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. On the same date, the Company issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	27,324,237
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock (&#x201C;Series&nbsp;B&#x201D;), par value
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$0.001
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$0.84
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share, which resulted in gross proceeds of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$20,050
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. Closing costs associated with the issuance of the Series&nbsp;B amounted to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$147
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. These costs were recorded as a reduction of the carrying amount of the Series&nbsp;B and were accreted to the carrying value of the applicable preferred stock. During 2013, the Company issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8,658,008
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Series&nbsp;C Preferred Stock (&#x201C;Series&nbsp;C&#x201D;) in exchange for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$12,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in a series of tranches. Costs incurred in connection with the issuance of Series&nbsp;C amounted to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$45
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and have been recorded as a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	18
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage132"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#COLL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	reduction to the carrying amount of Series&nbsp;C and were accreted to the carrying value of the applicable preferred stock. In accordance with the terms of the Series&nbsp;C Preferred Stock Purchase Agreement, the Company authorized the sale and issuance of up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8,658,008
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Series&nbsp;C for total gross proceeds of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$12,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. Closing costs associated with the issuance of Series&nbsp;C amounted to $45. The Series&nbsp;C financing was structured to close in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	tranches. The Company determined the right of the investors to purchase shares of Series&nbsp;C in a future tranche met the definition of a freestanding financial instrument and was recognized as a liability at fair value. The Company adjusted the carrying value of the tranche obligations to its estimated fair value at each reporting date and upon closing of the second tranche in December 2013. Increases or decreases in the fair value of the tranche obligations were recorded as other expense, net, in the statements of operations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The first tranche closed in August and September 2013 and resulted in the issuance of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2,886,004
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Series&nbsp;C for gross cash proceeds of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$4,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. Upon the first tranche closing, the Company recognized a liability of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$266
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for the fair value of the future tranche obligations. The fair value of the freestanding instrument tranche obligations was determined using Black
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;Scholes option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;pricing models on the date of the issuance using the following assumptions: fair value of Series&nbsp;C of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.30
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, expected life of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	0.35
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	0.43
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;years and expected volatility of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	53%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	60%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The liability related to the tranche obligations was remeasured at fair value up to the date of the closing of the second tranche in December 2013. Upon the closing of the second tranche, the Company derecognized the tranche obligation, which resulted in a net increase in the proceeds allocated to the Series&nbsp;C shares of $345. The fair value of the freestanding instrument tranche obligations was determined using Black
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;Scholes option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;pricing models on the date of the issuance using the following assumptions: fair value of Series&nbsp;C of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.27
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, expected life of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	0.16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;years and expected volatility of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	52%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The valuation of the tranche obligation liability was determined to be a Level&nbsp;3 valuation based upon the use of unobservable inputs. A roll
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209; forward of the recurring fair value measurements of the tranche liability categorized with Level&nbsp;3 inputs are as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_27"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">

<TR>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:1PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:03.90%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The closing of the second tranche of Series&nbsp;C in December 2013 triggered
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	erformance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	djustment of the outstanding shares of Series&nbsp;A and common stock to which the Series&nbsp;A and common stock were subject to modification in which every
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of issued and outstanding Series&nbsp;A and common shares became
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	share of each class respectively. In connection with the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	erformance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	djustment, the Company adjusted the carrying value of the outstanding shares of Series&nbsp;A to its redemption amount by recording a decrease of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$12,239
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In March 2015, the Company sold 41,666,667 shares of Series D convertible preferred stock for aggregate consideration of $50,000, comprised of $45,000 in cash and conversion of $5,000 in convertible notes with related parties. The convertible notes converted into 4,166,667 shares of Series&nbsp;D convertible preferred stock. The accrued interest on the convertible notes was waived. In this financing, the mandatory conversion for all series of preferred stock was modified so as to occur upon an initial public offering with gross proceeds in excess of $50,000.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	11. STOCK
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;BASED COMPENSATION
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Restricted Stock Awards and Stock Options
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In May 2015, the Company adopted the Amended and Restated 2014 Stock Incentive Plan (the &#x201C;Plan&#x201D;), under which an aggregate of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2,700,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of common stock are authorized for issuance to employees, officers, directors, consultants and advisors of the Company, plus an annual increase to be added on the first day of each fiscal year until the expiration of the Plan equal to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of the total number of outstanding shares of common stock on December 31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	st
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of the immediately preceding calendar year (or a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	lower amount as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	otherwise determined by the board of directors prior to January 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	st
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	). As of December&nbsp;31, 2015, 1,452,149 of the shares of common stock authorized for issuance pursuant to the Plan were outstanding. In connection with the Company&#x2019;s reincorporation into Virginia in July 2014, each outstanding option to purchase shares of common stock under the 2012 Stock Incentive Plan and 2002 Stock Plan, was automatically terminated and replaced with an option to purchase shares of common stock under the Plan having the same vesting terms and exercise price as the option that was replaced. The Plan provides for granting of both Internal Revenue Service qualified incentive stock options (&#x201C;ISOs&#x201D;) and non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;qualified options (&#x201C;NQs&#x201D;), restricted stock awards (&#x201C;RSAs&#x201D;) and restricted stock units (&#x201C;RSUs&#x201D;). Stock options generally vest over a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	year period of service; however, certain options contain performance conditions. The options generally have a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ten
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	year contractual life and, upon termination, vested options are generally exercisable between
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	months following the termination date, while unvested options are forfeited immediately.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Stock option activity under the Plan is summarized as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_28"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">

<TR>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.62%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&#8209;Scholes option pricing model and restricted stock based on the fair value of the award. Stock options and restricted stock issued to non

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;employees are accounted for using the fair value approach and are subject to periodic revaluation over their vesting terms.

</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Risk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#8209;free Interest Rate.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The risk
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;free interest rate assumption is based on observed interest rates appropriate for the expected term of the stock option grants.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Expected Volatility.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Due to the Company&#x2019;s limited operating history and lack of company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;specific historical or implied volatility, the expected volatility assumption is based on historical volatilities of a peer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	group of similar companies whose share prices are publicly available. The peer group was developed based
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	on com
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	panies in the biotechnology and pharmaceutical industries.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In evaluating similarity, we consider factors such as industry, stage of life cycle and size.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	21
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage135"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#COLL-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#0563C1;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Expected Term.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The expected term represents the period of time that options are expected to be outstanding. Because the Company does not have historical exercise behavior, through December&nbsp;31, 2015 it determined the expected life assumption using the simplified method, which is an average of the contractual term of the option and its vesting period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Expected Dividend Yield.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The expected dividend yield assumption is based on the fact that the Company has never paid cash dividends and has no present intention to pay cash dividends.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	12.&nbsp;INCOME TAXES&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	For the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2015, 2014 and 2013, the Company did not record a current or deferred income tax expense or (benefit) due to current and historical losses incurred by the Company. The Company&#x2019;s losses before income taxes consist solely of domestic losses.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	A reconciliation of income tax expense (benefit) computed at the statutory federal income tax rate to income taxes as reflected in the financial statements is as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_32"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 100.00%;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has evaluated the positive and negative evidence bearing upon the realizability of its deferred tax assets. As of December&nbsp;31, 2015 and 2014, based on the Company&#x2019;s history of operating losses, the Company has concluded that it is not more likely than not that the benefit of its deferred tax assets will be realized. Accordingly, the Company has provided a full valuation allowance for deferred tax assets as of December&nbsp;31, 2015 and 2014. The valuation allowance increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$10,539
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$7,737
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	during the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2015 and 2014 respectively, due primarily to net operating losses generated.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of December&nbsp;31, 2015, 2014 and 2013, the Company had U.S. federal net operating loss carryforwards of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$104,888
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$78,276
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$60,380
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively, which may be available to offset future income tax liabilities and expire at various dates through 2035. As of December&nbsp;31, 2015, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and 2013, the Company also had U.S. state net operating loss carryforwards of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$59,875
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>

	$34,184

	and

	, respectively, which may be available to offset future income tax

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Under the provisions of the Internal Revenue Code, the net operating loss and tax credit carryforwards are subject to review and possible adjustment by the Internal Revenue Service and state tax authorities. Net operating loss and tax credit carryforwards may become subject to an annual limitation in the event of certain cumulative changes in the ownership interest of significant shareholders over a three-year period in excess of 50 percent, as defined under Sections 382 and 383 of the Internal Revenue Code, respectively, as well as similar state provisions. This could limit the amount of tax attributes that can be utilized annually to offset future taxable income or tax liabilities. The amount of the annual limitation is determined based on the value of the Company immediately prior to the ownership change. Subsequent ownership changes may further affect the limitation in future years. The Company has completed several financings since its inception which may have resulted in a change in control as defined by Sections 382 and 383 of the Internal Revenue Code, or could result in a change in control in the future.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:13.5PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company will recognize interest and penalties related to uncertain tax positions in income tax expense. As of December&nbsp;31, 2015 and 2014, the Company had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	accrued interest or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	penalties related to uncertain tax positions and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	amounts have been recognized in the Company&#x2019;s statements of operations and comprehensive loss.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	For all years through December&nbsp;31, 2015, the Company generated research
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and development
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	credits but has not conducted a study to document the qualified activities. This study may result in an adjustment to the Company&#x2019;s research and development credit carryforwards; however, until a study is completed and any adjustment is known, no amounts are being presented as an uncertain tax position for these two years. A full valuation allowance has been provided against the Company&#x2019;s research and development credits and, if an adjustment is required, this adjustment would be offset by an adjustment to the deferred tax asset established for the research and development credit carryforwards and the valuation allowance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company files income tax returns in the United States and Massachusetts. The federal and Massachusetts income tax returns are generally subject to tax examinations for the tax years ended December&nbsp;31, 2012 through December&nbsp;31, 2015. To the extent the Company has tax attribute carryforwards, the tax years in which the attribute was generated may still be adjusted upon examination by the Internal Revenue Service and state tax authorities to the extent utilized in a future period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	13. EMPLOYEE BENEFITS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has a retirement savings plan, which is qualified under section&nbsp;401(k) of the Code, for its employees. The plan allows eligible employees to defer, at the employee&#x2019;s discretion, pretax compensation up to the Internal Revenue Service annual limits. Employees become eligible to participate after completing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;months of service. The Company is not required to contribute to this plan. Total expense for contributions made by the Company was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$35
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$44
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

</FONT>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	15. SUBSEQUENT EVENTS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has completed an evaluation of all subsequent events through March 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, 2016, the date these financial statements are available to be issued. The Company has concluded that only
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	subsequent event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	has occurred requires disclosure. In January 2016,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	issued and sold in a public offering an aggregate of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2,750,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	common stock at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$20.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share. This public offering resulted in approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$51,700
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of net proceeds, after deduction underwriting discounts and commissions but before deducting other offering expenses payable by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. At December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	capitalized
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$353
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of costs related to expenses incurred in this public offering. These costs were reclassified to additional paid-in capital when the offering closed in January, 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="COLL-20151231EX3110E0748_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Exhibit 31.1
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATION
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	OF CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER PURSUANT
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	TO SECTION 302 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Michael T. Heffernan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1. I have reviewed this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	annual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	report on Form 10-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	K
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Collegium Pharmaceutical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2. Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3. Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4. The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#x2019;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#x2019;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#x2019;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#x2019;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 43.52%;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:100.00%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;WIDTH: 90.00%;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

	MICHAEL T. HEFFERNAN
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="COLL-20151231EX3126379C5_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Exhibit 31.2
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATION
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	OF CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER PURSUANT
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	TO SECTION 302 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Paul Brannelly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1. I have reviewed this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	annual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	report on Form 10-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	K
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Collegium Pharmaceutical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2. Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3. Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4. The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 30PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#x2019;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5. The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#x2019;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#x2019;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#x2019;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%;">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 46.30%;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT;">

	he date hereof (the &#x201C;Report&#x201D;), the undersigned

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to his knowledge
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(1)

	ection 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and

	The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.

	(1)
